rows: Specify where the activity takes place, for example, the name of the meeting room.
Fill out the field if you want any user that has a specific role to be able to complete the activity instead of setting the activity to a specific owner.
html:
Field

Field value

Location

Specify where the activity takes place, for example, the name of the meeting room.

Role

Fill out the field if you want any user that has a specific role to be able to complete the activity instead of setting the activity to a specific owner.
